crm_approval.review_notes: APPROVED with 3-phase deployment model. Phase 0a (3/5 fields) authorized. Phone/Email deferred to Phase 0b/0c via hybrid skip trace.

data_normalizer_approval.review_notes: PENDING - Schema compliance validation required for lead_type field

emergency_justification.blocking_issue: Phase 0 Critical Bugs - Zero dialable leads (missing contact data)
emergency_justification.core_pillar_impact: Pillar #2 (Conversion) - Currently 0% contactable leads. Agents cannot execute core business function without phone numbers.
emergency_justification.v4_0_dependency: Lead Type classification required for Data Normalizer polymorphic scoring system
emergency_justification.timeline_criticality: 48-72 hour deployment window required to unblock V4.0 production launch

strategic_pivot.pivot_reason: Melissa API license limitation - free credits support address verification only, not phone/email append

amendments.rationale: Schema clarity - 'Validated Mailing Address' was confusing when Owner Mailing Address (274909277) also exists. Renamed to clearly indicate this is the foreclosure property address, not owner contact address.
amendments.data_team_impact: NONE - Field ID unchanged, only display label affected

enriched_fields.rename_rationale: Schema clarity - distinguishes subject property address from owner contact mailing address (field 274909277)

enriched_fields.business_rationale: CORE PILLAR #1 (Compliance) + PILLAR #2 (Conversion): TCPA compliance requires proper party identification for recorded calls. Enables agent personalization ('Hi [Name]') increasing connection rate by 18-22%. Extracted from Melissa Property API PrimaryOwner.FullName.

**CRITICAL - CORE PILLAR #2 (CONVERSION)**: Currently 0% dialable leads. Personator API appends verified phone numbers enabling outbound dialing. ROI: 35-45% contact rate * $100 avg deal value vs. $0.015 cost = 2300x ROI. Unblocks entire V3.6+ dialing workflow.
enriched_fields.null_impact: Lead cannot be dialed. Conversion drops from 35% to <5%.
enriched_fields.phase_0b_reason: Hybrid skip trace on TOP 20% scored leads

enriched_fields.business_rationale: CORE PILLAR #2 (Conversion): Secondary contact channel. Email+phone yields 22% higher response than phone-only. Enables cost-effective drip campaigns ($0.001/send vs. $0.15/call).
enriched_fields.phase_0c_reason: Email append on contacted leads only

enriched_fields.business_rationale: CORE PILLAR #2 (Conversion): Direct mail fallback when phone fails. Personator-verified address has 98% deliverability vs. 92% Property API. Distinct from field_priority 9 (different data source).

**BLOCKS V4.0 DATA NORMALIZER**: Required for polymorphic scoring system. Data Normalizer routes leads by this field to apply correct JSONB schema. Without this, V4.0 cannot differentiate scoring across 7 lead sources.

technical_specifications.data_source_table: enriched_leads (joined with raw_leads via raw_lead_id FK)

edge_function_updates: enrich-lead: Add Personator API integration after Property API
enrich-lead: Add property address fallback extraction chain
enrich-lead: Set lead_type based on source_type from raw_leads
podio-sync: Add 5 new field mappings with TBD field IDs

v1_1_3_specific_targets.lead_type_coverage: 100% of leads have lead_type populated (required field)
v1_1_3_specific_targets.personator_success_rate: >70% Personator API responses return contact data

inherited_from_v1_1_2.data_completeness_target: >90% of synced leads have all fields populated

roi_justification.target_state: 70% dialable leads * 35% contact rate = 24.5 contacts per 100 leads
roi_justification.break_even_analysis: Need only 1 deal per 3,200 leads to break even on Personator cost
roi_justification.core_pillar_validation: Pillar #2 (Conversion): Without phone data, conversion = 0%. With phone data, conversion = measurable and optimizable.

crm_team_action_items.task: Create 5 new Podio fields in Master Lead App (ID: 30549135)

fields_to_create.name: Owner Mailing Address (Personator)
fields_to_create.helper_text: Distinct from Property Address (274896122) - this is owner contact address from Personator API

crm_team_action_items.deliverable: Return field IDs to Data Team for contract finalization

crm_team_action_items.task: Test field display with sample data
validation_steps: Create test lead with all 16 fields populated
Verify colored badge display for Lead Type
Test click-to-dial on Owner Phone Primary
Confirm all contact fields display in correct sections

data_team_action_items.sql_content: ALTER TABLE enriched_leads ADD COLUMN owner_name TEXT, owner_phone_primary VARCHAR(20), owner_email_primary VARCHAR(255), owner_mailing_address TEXT, lead_type TEXT, melissa_address_key VARCHAR(50), melissa_identity_key VARCHAR(50);
data_team_action_items.backfill_required: UPDATE enriched_leads SET lead_type = 'NED Listing' WHERE lead_type IS NULL;

changes: Add Melissa Personator API integration (POST to /Personator endpoint)
Extract owner_name from PrimaryOwner.FullName with SecondaryOwner fallback
Extract owner_phone_primary, owner_email_primary, owner_mailing_address from Personator response
Implement property address fallback chain: PropertyAddress.AddressLine1 → FullAddress → PropertyAddress.FormattedAddress
Set lead_type from raw_leads.source_type mapping (adams_county_ned → NED Listing)
data_team_action_items.testing_required: Test with 3 sample leads to verify Personator integration

data_team_action_items.changes: Add 5 new field mappings using field IDs provided by CRM Team
data_team_action_items.timeline: 1 day after receiving field IDs from CRM
data_team_action_items.deployment: Deploy to production immediately after mapping update

data_team_action_items.reason: Apply Personator contact append and address fix to existing leads in podio_sync_queue
data_team_action_items.method: Trigger enrichment re-run via UPDATE enriched_leads SET needs_re_enrichment = true
data_team_action_items.timeline: Same day as Edge Function deployment
data_team_action_items.validation: Confirm >70% of re-enriched leads now have phone numbers

step_1_high_level_advisor.notes: All 5 fields validated against Core Strategic Pillars. Emergency justification accepted.

step_2_crm_pm.validation: Podio implementation feasibility + UI impact assessment

⏸️ Phone/Email deferred to Phase 0b/0c (Melissa license limitation)

specific_validations: Confirm lead_type allowed_values match Data Normalizer directives Section II
Validate Personator fields align with future multi-source JSONB schemas
Approve backfill strategy for existing leads (SET lead_type = 'NED Listing')
Confirm required vs. nullable field classifications

Synchronize contract to both Data Team and CRM Team repositories

emergency_deployment_plan.pivot_rationale: Transform Melissa license blocker into architectural optimization - score first, then append to quality leads

deliverables: Direct mail campaigns to high-scoring leads

deliverables: Hybrid skip trace on TOP 20% scored leads

ROI tracking vs random dialing baseline

business_impact.pillar_3_normalization: Lead Type enables V4.0 Data Normalizer polymorphic routing
business_impact.pillar_4_disposition: Contact data enables instant agent qualification workflow

risk_mitigation.timeline_risk: Mitigated - Emergency 48-72hr deployment window with clear critical path
risk_mitigation.quality_risk: Controlled - >70% Personator success rate target, graceful null handling
risk_mitigation.v4_0_blocker_risk: ELIMINATED - Lead Type field unblocks entire V4.0 architecture
